p:
To determine climate change impacts on common bean ( Phaseolus vulgaris) suitability for cultivation in southeastern Africa, the EcoCrop model was used to produce spatially-explicit simulations of potential climatic suitability for five countries in south-eastern Africa. For each spatial unit (i.e. grid cell), EcoCrop performs separate calculations for temperature-limited (heat and cold) and precipitation-limited (waterlogging and drought) suitability, and then calculates an overall suitability for the crop
21, 22 .
